title: Pirates 2: Dead Man's Chest video for iPod MP4
description:
# Plot Outline Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones&#039; service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.
# Plot Synopsis: Once again we&#039;re plunged into the world of sword fights and "savvy" pirates. Captain Jack Sparrow is reminded he owes a debt to Davy Jones, Who captains the flying Dutch man ,a ghostly ship, with a crew from hell. Facing the "locker" Jack must find the heart of Davy Jones but to save himself he must get the help of quick-witted Will Turner and Elizabeth Swan. If that&#039;s not complicated enough will and Elizabeth are sentenced to hang, unless will can get Lord Cutler Beckett Jack&#039;s compass, Will is forced to join another crazy adventure with Jack.
